title: Fragment, 1923-7-32, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with continuous supplementary warp patterning
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: Light orange taffeta ground with vertical ribbon-like stripes and serpentine small-scale flowering vines passing behind stripes in supplementary warps of blue, rose, terra cotta, yellow, white and green silks.
